import React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; // import {Component} from 'react'; import Logo from '../images/logo.svg'; const EditObjective = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ name: "hi", domain: "Syntax", tags: "Recall, Know" }) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { setEditState({ ...setState, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } return (

Course Creator

Syntax

Option 2

Latin has no def articles... Syntax Recall, Know 0 EDIT
Nouns vary by gender Syntax Recall, Know 5
Nouns vary by person Syntax Recall, Know 3
) } export default EditObjective;
